rules_text:
Flying
When Certhus Survey Drone leaves the battlefield, put a land card from your graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.
Basic landcycling {2} [i]({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)[/i]
Crew 1 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]
